page.title: 14OUR VILLAGE OF SHREWTON
page.content: Shrewton is generally governed by the Parish Council, and we are represented on the Salisbury District Council and the Wiltshire County Council. The rates for Shrewton this year 1985/6 are as follows: County = 147p District = 8.5p and the Parish = 2.9p - Total = 158.4p. Some of the services provided for the village are: Schools - Primary in Shrewton and Secondary in Amesbury. Police, Fire Service and Ambulance which is administered from Amesbury. Local Dispensing Doctor and Nursing Service. Community Housing with a Warden. Meals on Wheels - three days a week. Post Office and Banking (Sub Branch). Refuse Disposal - once a week. Mobile Library - twice a month. Council Housing.
